news_title: Nine Finalists Chosen in NASA's Mars 2020 Rover Naming Contest
news_paragraph: Nine finalists have been chosen in the essay contest for K-12 students across U.S. to name NASA's next Mars rover. Now you can help by voting for your favorite.
